item.title: LOCKHEED MARTIN CORP 10-K
item.description: LOCKHEED MARTIN CORP, which is in the Guided Missiles & Space Vehicles & Parts [3760] industry, SEC 10-K filing on January 26, 2023 had 45872 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 466 instances u - 327 instances contract - 323 instances net - 315 instances million - 304 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
